body_html:
@asimshankar Great! Looking forward to the discussions.

FWIW, TensorRT has a nice C++ API and JavaCPP maps it pretty well too:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/tree/master/tensorrt
I'm not saying TensorFlow needs a C++ API though. I suppose tools for other platforms should catch up before it makes sense...

body:
@asimshankar Great! Looking forward to the discussions.

FWIW, TensorRT has a nice C++ API and JavaCPP maps it pretty well too:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/tree/master/tensorrt
I'm not saying TensorFlow needs a C++ API though. I suppose tools for other platforms should catch up before it makes sense...
